tool_description: A collection of location and time utilities. You can search for country/city information worldwide, find out distance between two locations/cities, get location data from IP address, solve any time questions regarding different timezones, get sunrise/sunset times at any location, get holiday information worldwide, and much more!
name: Location and Time
title: Location and Time

api_list.name: Get Astral Data by City
api_list.description: Get times of various aspects of the sun for specified date and city, including dawn, sunrise, noon, sunset, dusk times. **Note**: the fuzzy search of provided city may not be the one you want due to multiple cities may have the same name, the most common one will be used. In this case, use a geocoding service to find the exact geolocation of the city, use /astral/bylocation endpoint instead.

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: Local date at location specified by `lat` and `lon`, fuzzy search is supported.

api_list.name: Calculate Distance Between Locations
api_list.description: Calculate distance between two geolocations. We return the [Geodesic distance](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Geodesics_on_an_ellipsoid)  and [Great-circle distance](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Great-circle_distance) for different use cases.

api_list.name: Decode Geohash
api_list.description: Decode a [geohash](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Geohash) string into a geolocation with a bounding box.

api_list.name: Search City by Name
api_list.description: Get details of the city specified by name, fuzzy search is supported. Up to 10 records for cities with similar name may be returned. Information includes city name, alternative names, geolocation (latitude/longitude), population, timezone, map url, and more.

api_list.name: Get Time at Other City
api_list.description: Find out time at `to_city` given `from_time` and `from_city`. Daylight saving time are taken care of.  **Note**: the fuzzy search of provided city may not be the one you want due to multiple cities may have the same name, the most common one will be used. In this case, use a geocoding service to find the exact geolocation of the city, use `/timeat/bylocation` endpoint instead.

required_parameters.name: from_time
required_parameters.description: Date and time, fuzzy search is supported.

api_list.name: Get Time Diff by Timezone
api_list.description: Find out time difference from `from_time` to `to_time` for specified timezone. Daylight saving time are taken care of.

required_parameters.name: to_timezone
required_parameters.description: Timezone from the response of /timezone endpoint.

required_parameters.name: from_timezone
required_parameters.description: Timezone from the response of /timezone endpoint.

api_list.name: Get Date and Time by Location
api_list.description: Get date and time for specified location.

api_list.name: Get Time at Other Timezone
api_list.description: Find out time at `to_timezone` for given `from_time` and `from_timezone`. Daylight saving time are taken care of.

required_parameters.name: from_timezone
required_parameters.description: Timezone from the response of `/timezone` endpoint.

required_parameters.name: to_timezone
required_parameters.description: Timezone from the response of `/timezone` endpoint.

required_parameters.name: from_time
required_parameters.description: Date and time, fuzzy search is supported.

api_list.name: Encode Geohash
api_list.description: Encode a geolocation into [geohash](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Geohash) string which can then used for applications such as proximity search.

api_list.name: Calculate Distance Between Cities
api_list.description: Calculate distance between two cities. We return the [Geodesic distance](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Geodesics_on_an_ellipsoid) and [Great-circle distance](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Great-circle_distance) for different use cases. Note: the fuzzy search of provided city may not be the one you want due to multiple cities may have the same name, the most common one will be used. In this case, use a geocoding service to find the exact geolocation of the city, use `/distance/bylocation` endpoint instead.

api_list.name: Get Geolocation by IP
api_list.description: Get geographic location information about the specific IP address. Information includes the city, country, continent, geolocation with accuracy, postal code, and more.

api_list.name: Search City by Location
api_list.description: Get details of the city near specified geolocation (latitude/longitude). Up to 10 records for cities close to the specified location may be returned. Information includes city name, alternative names, geolocation (latitude/longitude), population, timezone, map url, and more.

api_list.name: Search Country by Name
api_list.description: Get details of the country specified by name, fuzzy search is supported. Up to 10 records for countries with similar name may be returned. Information includes country name, capital, area, population, languages, neighbors, phone code, postal code, and more.

api_list.name: Get Time Diff by City
api_list.description: Find out time difference from `from_time` to `to_time` for specified cities. Daylight saving time are taken care of.  **Note**: the fuzzy search of provided city may not be the one you want due to multiple cities may have the same name, the most common one will be used. In this case, use a geocoding service to find the exact geolocation of the city, use `/timediff/bylocation` endpoint instead.

api_list.name: Get Time at Other Location
api_list.description: Find out time at `[to_lat, to_lon]` given `from_time` and `[from_lat, from_lon]`. Daylight saving time are taken care of.

required_parameters.name: from_time
required_parameters.description: Date and time, fuzzy search is supported.

api_list.name: Get Supported Timezones
api_list.description: Get all supported timezones.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://location-and-time.p.rapidapi.com/timezone"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "location-and-time.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://location-and-time.p.rapidapi.com/timezone"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "location-and-time.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Holidays
api_list.description: List holidays for the specified country and year.

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: Name of the country, fuzzy search is supported.

optional_parameters.name: year
optional_parameters.description: Year. If not provided, current year will be used.

api_list.name: Get Date and Time by Timezone
api_list.description: Get date and time for specified timezone.

required_parameters.name: timezone
required_parameters.description: Specify time zone from the response of `/timezone` endpoint.

api_list.name: Get Date and Time by City
api_list.description: Get current date and time for specified city, fuzzy search is supported. **Note**: the fuzzy search of provided city may not be the one you want due to multiple cities may have the same name, the most common one will be used. In this case, use a geocoding service to find the exact geolocation of the city, use `/datetime/bylocation` endpoint instead.

api_list.name: Get Astral Data by Location
api_list.description: Get times of various aspects of the sun for specified date and location, including dawn, sunrise, noon, sunset, dusk times.

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: Local date at location specified by `lat` and `lon`, fuzzy search is supported.

api_list.name: Get Time Diff by Location
api_list.description: Find out time difference from `from_time` to `to_time` for specified location. Daylight saving time are taken care of.
